This is a Next.js project for "Salif Gebäudeservice – Haus und mehr GbR", a German cleaning and facility management company based in Pirmasens.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework:** Next.js (App Router) with TypeScript
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS v4
- **Animations:** Framer Motion
- **Icons:** Lucide React

## Project Structure
- `src/app/` – Next.js App Router pages and layout
- `src/components/` – Reusable React components (Navbar, Hero, Services, About, Contact, Footer)

## Guidelines
- All user-facing text is in German
- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling
- Use Framer Motion for scroll-triggered and hover animations
- Follow the brand colors: Primary (#1a3a5c), Accent (#22c55e)
- Components use "use client" directive for client-side interactivity
